title: Cadel Evans Great Ocean Road Race
articleDescription: Public transport during the Cadel Evans Road Race from Wednesday 28 January to Sunday 1 February
articleContent:
Cycling Events during the Cadel Evans Great Ocean Road Race:

  • Wednesday 28 January: Surf Coast Classic - Women, Lorne to Torquay
  • Thursday 29 January: Surf Coast Classic - Men, Lorne to Torquay
  • Friday 30 January: Family Ride, Geelong Waterfront
  • Saturday 31 January February: People’s Ride and Cadel Evans Great Ocean Road Ride – Women, Geelong-Bellarine-Surf Coast
  • Sunday 1 February: Cadel Evans Great Ocean Road Ride – Men, Geelong-Bellarine-Surf Coast

Please refer to Cadel Evans Great Ocean Roadrace website for further event information, road closures and accessibility information.

Planned Closures

Due to the Cadel Evans Great Ocean Road Race in Geelong, the Bellarine and Surf Coast, bus Routes 1, 20, 30, 31, 24, 41, 42, 43, 50, 52, 53, 54, 51, 55, 56, 60, 61 and 101 (Apollo Bay - Geelong) will experience delays, be diverted in both directions and selected bus stops will not be serviced on Wednesday 28 January, Thursday 29 January, Saturday 31 January and Sunday 1 February.

Additionally, on Saturday 31 January, the Warrnambool Line will be suspended between Waurn Ponds and Warrnambool, affecting the 1:10pm Southern Cross to Warrnambool and 5:36pm Warrnambool to Melbourne services. Replacement Coaches will be available from Geelong Station. 

Wednesday 28 and Thursday 29 January

Regional train

Getting to Geelong

Passengers can catch regular services arriving at Geelong and Marshal Railway Station and connect with bus services to Torquay.

Leaving Geelong

Passengers can return via bus services from Torquay and catch regular services departing Geelong and Marshal Railway Station.

Regional Bus

Stop changes from 1pm to 3:30pm

Due to road closures in Torquay for the Surf Coast Classic on Anderson Street and The Esplanade, services on Routes 52, 53 and 54 will divert and not service Bell Street and sections of The Esplanade from 1pm service to 3:30pm.

The following bus stops will not be serviced from 1pm to 3:30pm:

  • The Esplanade/Price St ID 30939
  • The Esplanade/Price St ID 30954

Stop changes from first to last service

Due to road closures in Lorne for the Surf Coast Classic on Mountjoy Parade, Geelong to Apollo Bay coach services will be required to divert. Services will terminate and originate from the Lorne Visitors Centre from first service to last service.

Saturday 31 January

Regional train

Getting to Geelong

Passengers can catch regular services arriving at Geelong Railway Station between Waurn Ponds and Melbourne (Southern Cross).

Due to the suspension of services on the Warrnambool Line between Waurn Ponds and Warrnambool, the following services will be affected and Replacement Coaches will be available for passengers between Warrnambool and Geelong Station.

  • 1:10pm Southern Cross to Warrnambool
  • 5:36pm Warrnambool to Melbourne

Leaving Geelong

Passengers can catch regular services departing Geelong Railway Station between Waurn Ponds and Melbourne (Southern Cross).

Regional Bus

Due to temporary and rolling road closures in place for the People’s Ride and UCI Women’s Elite Road Race, there will be delays and service changes to bus Routes 1, 20, 22, 24, 25, 30, 31, 41, 42, 51, 52, 53, 54, 55, 56, 60, 61 and 101 (Apollo Bay - Geelong) around Geelong, the Bellarine and Surf Coast.

Stop changes from 12pm to 4:45pm

Due to closures on Moorabool Street, services on route 1 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 12pm and 4:45pm. 

The following inbound stops will not be serviced between 12pm and 4:45pm:

  • Little Fyans St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30743
  • Cameron Park/High St (Belmont) id 30742
  • South Geelong Station/Lonsdale St (South Geelong) ID 45073

A temporary bus stop will be located at 8 Mt Pleasant Road for passengers travelling inbound.

The following outbound bound stops will not be serviced between 12pm and 4:45pm:

  • Kilgour St/Moorabool St (Geelong) ID 30673
  • Lonsdale St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 47749
  • South Geelong Station/Lonsdale St (South Geelong) ID 41423
  • Foster St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30675
  • Balliang St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30676
  • Barwon Tce/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30677
  • Belmont Village Shopping Centre/High St (Belmont) ID 30679

Stop changes from 12:15pm to 4:45pm – (Customer Bulletin done - City)

Due to closures on Moorabool Street, services on route 24 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 12:15pm and 4:45pm. 

The following outbound bus stops will be services from 12:15pm to 4:45pm:

  • Kilgour Street/Moorabool Street ID 30673
  • Lonsdale Street/Moorabool Street ID 47749
  • Foster Street/Moorabool Street ID 30675
  • Latrobe Bvd/Fyans Street ID 48067

Stop changes from 12:15pm to 4:45pm

Due to closures on Scenic Road, Barrabool Road, services on route 43 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 12:15pm and 4:45pm. 

The following bus stops will be services from 12:15pm to 4:45pm:

  • Larcombe Park/Barrabool Rd ID 50794
  • 41571 – Barwon Blvd
  • Cedar Gr/Mt Pleasant Rd ID 50796
  • Barwon Water Reserve/Scenic Rd ID 50801
  • Desmond St/Scenic Rd ID 45161
  • 21 Buckley Falls Rd ID 45163
  • Buckley Falls Rd/Highett Rd ID 45165
  • Scenic Rd/Highett Rd ID 45167
  • Sloanne Ct/Province Bvd ID 45168
  • 45160 – Barrabool Hills Baptist Church
  • Lansbury Cres/Scenic Rd ID 50800
  • Cedar Gr/Mt Pleasant Road ID 50797
  • Barwon Bvd/Mt Pleasant Rd ID 50798

Stop changes from 2:15pm to 4:45pm

Due to closures on Glenlieth Avenue and The Esplanade, services on route 20 will need to divert and not service sections of Glenlieth Avenue, The Esplanade and Mercer Street between 2:15pm and 4:45pm.

The following bus stops in both directions will not be serviced from 2:15pm and 4:45pm:

  • Wattletree Road/Princes Hwy ID 30178
  • McMillan Avenue/Glenleith Avenue ID 30179
  • Melbourne Road/Church Street ID 30209
  • The Esplanade/Glenleith Avenue ID 30207

  • Toorak Parade/The Esplanade ID 30181

  • Keera St/The Esplanade ID 30182
  • Mercer St/The Esplanade ID 30205

Stop changes from 2:45pm to 4:45pm

Due to closures on Aberdeen Street, Minerva Road and Church Street, services on route 24 will need to divert and not service sections of Aberdeen Street, Minerva Road and Church Street between 2:45pm and 4:45pm.

The following bus stops in both directions will not be serviced from 2:45pm and 4:45pm:

  • Silk Street/Aberdeen Street ID 30545
  • Silk Street/Aberdeen Street ID 30551
  • Minerva Road/ Aberdeen Street ID 30545
  • Minerva Road/Aberdeen Street ID 50828
  • Sherbourne Tce/Minerva Road ID 50829

  • Wimmera Avenue/Minerva Road ID 30261
  • Peter Lowe Reserve/Minerva Rd ID 30260
  • Hilltop Street/Minerva Road ID 30272

  • Panorama Road/Minerva Road ID 30273
  • Strachan Avenue/Minerva Road ID 30259
  • Douglass Street/Minerva Road ID 30274
  • Douglass Street/ Minerva Road ID 30258
  • Murphy Avenue/Minerva Road ID 30293
  • Church Street/Minerva Road ID 30257
  • Arthur Street/Church Street ID 30256
  • Arthur Street/Church Street ID 30275

Stop changes from 3:40pm to 4:35pm

Due to closures on Moorabool Street, services on routes 30, 31, 32, 41, 42, 50, 53, 55, 56, 60 and 61 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 3:40pm and 4:35pm. 

The following outbound stops will not be serviced between 3:40pm and 4:35pm:

  • Moorabool St (Geelong) ID 45326 (30, 31, 32, 41, 42, 50, 53, 55, 56, 60, 61
  • Kilgour St/Moorabool St (Geelong) ID 30673 (1, 41, 42, 53, 55)
  • Lonsdale St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 47749 (41, 42, 53, 55)
  • South Geelong Station/Lonsdale St (South Geelong) ID 41423 (1)
  • Foster St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30675 (1, 41, 42, 53, 55)
  • Balliang St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30676 (1, 41, 42, 53, 55)
  • Barwon Tce/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30677 (1, 41, 42, 53, 55)
  • Belmont Village Shopping Centre/High St (Belmont) ID 30679 (1, 41, 42, 53)
  • High St/Barwon Heads Rd (Belmont) ID 30828 (55)

The following inbound stops will not be serviced between 3:40pm and 4:35pm:

  • Moorabool St (Geelong) ID 45326 (30, 31, 32, 41, 42, 50, 53, 55, 56, 60, 61)

Sunday 1 February

Regional train

Getting to Geelong

Passengers can catch regular services arriving at Geelong Railway Station.

Leaving Geelong

Passengers can catch regular services departing Geelong Railway Station.

Regional Bus

Due to temporary and rolling road closures in place for the UCI Men’s Elite Road Race, there will be delays and service changes to bus Routes 1, 20, 22, 24, 25, 30, 31, 41, 42, 51, 52, 53, 54, 55, 56, 60, 61 and 101 (Apollo Bay - Geelong) around Geelong, the Bellarine and Surf Coast.

Stop changes from 1pm to 4pm

Due to closures on Moorabool Street, services on route 1 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 1pm and 4pm. 

The following inbound bus stops will not be serviced between 1pm and 4pm:

  • Little Fyans St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30743
  • Cameron Park/High St (Belmont) id 30742
  • South Geelong Station/Lonsdale St (South Geelong) ID 45073

The following outbound bus stops will not be serviced between 1pm and 4pm:

  • Kilgour St/Moorabool St (Geelong) ID 30673
  • Lonsdale St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 47749
  • South Geelong Station/Lonsdale St (South Geelong) ID 41423
  • Foster St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30675
  • Balliang St/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30676
  • Barwon Tce/Moorabool St (South Geelong) ID 30677
  • Belmont Village Shopping Centre/High St (Belmont) ID 30679

A temporary bus stop will be located at 8 Mt Pleasant Road for passengers travelling inbound.

Stop changes from 1pm to 4:30pm

Due to closures on Glenlieth Avenue and The Esplanade, services on route 20 will need to divert and not service sections of Glenlieth Avenue, The Esplanade and Mercer Street between 1pm and 4:30pm.

  • Wattletree Road/Princes Hwy ID 30178

  • Toorak Parade/The Esplanade ID 30181

  • Keera St/The Esplanade ID 30182
  • Mercer St/The Esplanade ID 30205

Stop changes from 1pm to 4:35pm

Due to closures on Moorabool Street, services on routes 30, 31, 32, 41, 42, 50, 53, 55, 56, 60 and 61 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 1pm and 4:35pm. 

The following outbound bus stops will not be serviced between 1pm and 4:35pm:

  • Moorabool St (Geelong) ID 45326 (30, 31, 32, 41, 42, 50, 53, 55, 56, 60, 61
  • Kilgour St/Moorabool St (Geelong) ID 30673 (41, 42, 53, 55)

  • High St/Barwon Heads Rd (Belmont) ID 30828 (55)

The following inbound stops will not be serviced between 2pm and 3:45pm:

  • Moorabool Street (Geelong) ID 45326 (30, 31, 32, 41, 42, 50, 53, 55, 56, 60, 61)

Stop changes from 1:30pm to 4:30pm

Due to closures on Aberdeen Street, Minerva Road and Church Street, services on route 24 will need to divert and not service sections of Aberdeen Street, Minerva Road and Church Street between 1:30pm and 4:30pm.

The following bus stops in both directions will not be serviced from 1:30pm and 4:30pm:

  • Silk Street/Aberdeen Street ID 30545
  • Silk Street/Aberdeen Street ID 30551
  • Minerva Road/ Aberdeen Street ID 30545
  • Minerva Road/Aberdeen Street ID 50828
  • Sherbourne Tce/Minerva Road ID 50829

  • Rankin Road/Minerva Road ID 30271

Stop changes from 1:30pm to 4pm

Due to closures on Moorabool Street, services on route 24 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 1:30pm and 4pm.

The following outbound bus stops will not be serviced from 1:30pm to 4pm: 

  • Kilgour Street/Moorabool Street ID 30673
  • Lonsdale Street/Moorabool Street ID 47749

Stop changes from 1pm to 4:30pm

Due to closures on Scenic Road, Barrabool Road, services on route 43 will need to divert and will not service sections of Moorabool Street and High Street between 1pm and 4:30pm.

Additional information

  • Visitors to Victoria: Here for a special event? Read more about our public transport system.
  • Help and support: View popular public transport topics, including ticketing.
  • Accessible travel: View resources for people with accessibility needs on public transport.
  • VicTraffic: Road closures, bushfire activity and other events on Victoria’s roads may affect your journey. Plan a safer trip by viewing real-time alerts on VicTraffic.
  • If you need more information or special assistance, please call 1800 800 007 before travelling.
